lastfm.summary: "Keep the Faith" is a song performed by American rock band Bon Jovi. The song was written by Jon Bon Jovi, Richie Sambora, and Desmond Child. It was released in 1992 as the lead single and title track from Bon Jovi's fifth studio album, Keep the Faith. It is characterised by its driving bass line and is a live staple for the band. "I Wish Everyday Could Be Like Christmas" appeared as a B-Side to the song in the US. In the United States, the song reached #1 on the Billboard Album Rock Tracks chart and peaked at #29 on the Billboard Hot 100. Read more on Last.fm.
